member.name: T:WebApplication1.Controllers.ModelTypeEmitter
member.summary: Creates types for proper schema generation. See https://jonathancrozier.com/blog/time-to-reflect-how-to-add-properties-to-a-c-sharp-object-dynamically-at-runtime

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.WtfProvider.GetUniquePath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add #method to JsonRpc urls to make them different for swagger

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.WtfProvider.WrapResponseType(System.Type)
member.summary: Wrap action response type into Response`T, set content-type application/json and HTTP code 200

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.WtfProvider.GetParameterDescriptions(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription,Tochka.JsonRpc.Server.Models.MethodMetadata)
member.summary: Wrap JsonRpc-bound parameters into Request`T. T is compiled dynamically to allow swagger schema generation

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.WtfProvider.GetRequestType(Tochka.JsonRpc.Server.Models.MethodMetadata)
member.summary: Generate type which describes whole request object with all parameters bound by json rpc

member.name: P:WebApplication1.Controllers.WtfProvider.Order
member.summary: Arbitrary number greater than -1000 in DefaultApiDescriptionProvider
